title: Chip and Elizabeth
name: Chip and Elizabeth
description:
A Map by Mefestus

A map of the places Chip and Elizabeth have lived, separate and together.

properties.name: 7th Street
properties.description: Posted by Mefestus725 7th Street, Santa Monica, CAChip lived here for a couple of years in Los Angeles.

properties.name: Clarendon Road
properties.description: Posted by Mefestus30 Clarendon Road, Birmingham, AL 35213This is where Chip lived from 5th grade through high school. Parents still live there. Neighbors included Tiger Miller, Elizabeth Klyce, Christopher Holly, Jim Joyce, Amy Formby and Casey Lucky. Elizabeth lived at 2624 Heathermoor during most of this time.

properties.name: Crestview Drive
properties.description: Posted by Mefestus115 Crestview Drive, Birmingham, AL 35213This is where Chip lived until 5th grade. Gingko tree out front, the creek running behind the back yard. Neighbors included grandparents (Frank and Mildred Cantey), Will and Clay Byars, Albert Finch, David Bowman and Leigh Rust. Elizabeth lived for most of this time on Sims Avenue.

properties.name: Durham, NC
properties.description: Posted by MefestusDuke UniversityChip spent a summer at Duke University\'s pre-college program between his junior and senior years in high school.

properties.name: Gough Street
properties.description: Posted by Mefestus  2222 Gough St, Baltimore, MDChip lived here while he went to graduate school at Johns Hopkins.

properties.name: Heathermoor Drive
properties.description: Posted by Mefestus2624 Heathermoor Dr., Birmingham, AL 35213This is where Elizabeth lived from 3rd grade through high school.

properties.name: Nashville, TN
properties.description: Posted by Mefestus2201 West End Avenue, Nashville, TNChip went to college at Vanderbilt University.

properties.name: Prosser Avenue
properties.description: Posted by Mefestus 1831 Prosser Avenue, Los Angeles, CAChip lived here for the first couple of years in Los Angeles.

properties.name: Roanoke, VA
properties.description: Posted by Mefestus24020Elizabeth went to college at Hollins University.

properties.name: Sims Avenue
properties.description: Posted by Mefestus811 Sims Avenue, Birmingham, ALElizabeth lived here from birth to 3rd grade.
